ygData.subject: RE: Begging taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: This is actually true. The mobs treat each pulse of the song as a separate spell on top of the fact that it is being cast on every member in the group. So
ygData.messageBody:
This is actually true. The mobs treat each pulse of the song as a separate
spell on top of the fact that it is being cast on every member in the group.
So Bards in a full group are casting six spells simultaneously as far as
mobs are concerned and those spells are going off every pulse.

Heisler
23rd circle of Brell
Armigers of Mirth, E'ci

I think you are forgetting that we clerics have the best taunt of all in our
spellbooks. It is called heal. I have even noticed that a bard singing
the healing song will pull more critters to them someone doing more damage.
Am I mistaken in this or is it really true?

Yilari, Cleric of Tunare, Erollisi Marr
